chapter.title: Web Browsers
chapter.para: Tamboti does not run with any version of Internet Explorer. It is our hope that the search interface will work with Internet Explorer 9, but it is not to be expected that the editor will work with Internet Explorer 9. The reason for this is the lack of standards compliance on the part of Internet Explorer.
Please use any of the following web browsers:

itemizedlist.listitem: Firefox 3.6 on Windows, Mac OS and Linux (Firefox 4 beta does not work with the editor).
Safari 5 on Windows and Mac OS.
Chrome 8 on Windows, Mac OS and Linux (and Chromium on Linux).
Opera 10 on Windows, Mac OS and Linux.

chapter.para: For search, these web browsers work the same.

For editing, these web browsers also work the same, but with differing speed. Chrome and Safari are 2.5 to 3 times faster than Firefox and Opera. The reason for this is the JavaScript engine used by these browsers. The forms for editing MODS records place high demands on the JavaScript engine.
When using the Basic Input Forms, the (legendary) slowness of Firefox should not be much of a problem, but when using the other input forms, our recommendation is to use Chrome or Safari.
